footer.description: A community-driven directory for discovering, sharing, and deploying Agent Skills following the open SKILL.md standard. Not an official Anthropic product.
footer.copyright: © {{year}} SkillsHub. This is a community project showcasing the SKILL.md open standard. Not affiliated with Anthropic, OpenAI, or any specific AI provider.

openStandard.title: Built on Open Standards
openStandard.description: The SKILL.md specification enables a portable, model-agnostic ecosystem of AI capabilities
openStandard.reusableDesc: Skills are modular capabilities that can be used across projects and teams.
openStandard.shareableDesc: Built on the open SKILL.md standard for easy sharing and collaboration.
openStandard.composableDesc: Combine multiple skills to create powerful automation workflows.

library.noResults: No skills found matching your criteria

submit.title: Submit a Skill
submit.description: Share your skills with the community. Make sure your skill follows the SKILL.md specification.
submit.skillInfoDesc: Provide details about your skill submission
submit.repoUrlHelp: GitHub, GitLab, or any public repository URL
submit.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this skill does
submit.requirementsText: Your skill must include a SKILL.md file with:
submit.submissionThanks: Thank you for contributing to the SkillsHub ecosystem! Your skill has been added to our review queue and will be reviewed shortly.
submit.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields.
submit.addedToQueue: Your skill has been added to the review queue.

about.title: About SkillsHub
about.description: A community-driven directory for discovering, sharing, and deploying Agent Skills following the open SKILL.md standard.
about.modularCapabilitiesDesc: Skills are reusable, self-contained capabilities that AI assistants can use to accomplish specific tasks. Each skill is a folder containing a SKILL.md file and any supporting resources.
about.modelInvokedDesc: Skills are automatically activated based on context. The AI reads the skill's description and determines when it's relevant to invoke, making skills feel like natural extensions of the AI's capabilities.
about.openStandardDesc: The SKILL.md specification is designed to be platform-agnostic, allowing skills to work across different AI assistants including Claude, ChatGPT, and others that adopt the standard.
about.communityDrivenDesc: Skills can be shared, forked, and improved by the community. This collaborative ecosystem enables rapid development of new capabilities and best practices.
about.specDescription: The minimum viable SKILL.md file requires only two fields in the YAML frontmatter:
about.requiredFieldName: name — The display name of your skill
about.requiredFieldDesc: description — A clear description the AI uses to determine when to invoke the skill
about.globalInstallDesc: Install skills globally so they're available across all projects:
about.projectInstallDesc: Install skills at the project level for project-specific capabilities:
about.installNote: Simply copy the skill folder (containing SKILL.md) to one of these locations. The AI will automatically discover and use available skills based on context.
about.readyToExploreDesc: Browse our curated collection of skills or submit your own to share with the community.

seo.defaultTitle: SkillsHub - Discover & Share AI Agent Skills | SKILL.md Directory
seo.defaultDescription: A community-driven directory for discovering, sharing, and deploying AI Agent Skills following the open SKILL.md standard. Find skills for Claude, ChatGPT, and other AI assistants.
seo.defaultKeywords: AI skills, agent skills, SKILL.md, Claude skills, ChatGPT skills, AI assistants, LLM tools, AI automation
seo.libraryDescription: Browse and discover 40+ curated AI skills for your AI workflows. Filter by category, platform, and more.
seo.collectionsDescription: Hand-picked skill bundles for common workflows including documentation, Git, code quality, and more.
seo.submitDescription: Share your AI skills with the community. Submit skills following the SKILL.md specification.
seo.aboutDescription: Learn about SkillsHub, the SKILL.md specification, and how to create and install AI Agent Skills.
